name: Mokum Solutions, Inc
description: Consultant and integrator of Oracle tech
overview:
Mokum Solutions is a consultant and integrator of Oracle technologies in private and public clouds. We have a passion for solving complex challenges like maximizing the agility, performance, security and value of our clients Oracle investments.

We specialize in the implementation, integration, delivery and support of Oracle technologies in private and public clouds. Our sole focus is providing the expertise to maximize the agility, performance, security and value of our clients’ Oracle investments.

We provide the full lifecycle of Oracle cloud consulting services:

Oracle Infrastructure Assessments
Oracle License Management
Oracle Hybrid (Private and Private) Cloud design, implementation, integration and support
Oracle VM design, implementation, integration and support
Oracle Enterprise Manager design, implementation, integration and support
Oracle Linux implementation, integration and support
Oracle Database, Oracle Fusion Middleware & Oracle E-Business Suite Templating and Rapid Delivery
Oracle Service Request (SR) Management
Proof of Concepts
Remote Support
Training
